member.name: T:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Helpers.PathSecurityValidator
member.summary: Provides secure path validation to prevent directory traversal attacks and other path-based security vulnerabilities. This utility should be used whenever user input or external data is used to construct file paths.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Helpers.PathSecurityValidator.ValidateAndResolvePath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validates that the requested path is within the allowed base directory and doesn't contain path traversal attempts.
member.param: The base directory that contains allowed files
The requested path to validate (can be relative)
member.returns: The fully resolved and validated absolute path
member.exception: Thrown when baseDirectory or requestedPath is null
Thrown when the path contains invalid characters, attempts directory traversal, or resolves outside the base directory
member.remarks: This method performs comprehensive validation including: - Null byte detection - Invalid path character detection - Relative path component detection (../) - Absolute path detection (C:\, /etc/) - UNC path detection (\\server\share) - Path traversal prevention (ensures resolved path stays within base directory)

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Helpers.PathSecurityValidator.ValidateFileExtension(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Validates that the file extension is in the allowed list.
member.param: The file path to validate
Array of allowed extensions (e.g., ".rdlc", ".rdl", ".pdf"). Case-insensitive.
member.exception: Thrown when filePath or allowedExtensions is null
Thrown when the extension is not allowed or missing

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Helpers.PathSecurityValidator.ValidateFileExists(System.String)
member.summary: Validates that a file exists at the specified path and is accessible.
member.param: The file path to check
member.exception: Thrown when the file doesn't exist
Thrown when the file is not accessible

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Helpers.PathSecurityValidator.IsPathWithinDirectory(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a path is within a specified directory (prevents path traversal).
member.param: The path to check (should be absolute)
The directory that should contain the path (should be absolute)
member.returns: True if path is within directory, false otherwise

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Helpers.PathSecurityValidator.SanitizeFileName(System.String,System.Char)
member.summary: Sanitizes a file name by removing potentially dangerous characters while preserving the extension. Use this for user-provided file names that will be saved to disk.
member.param: The file name to sanitize
Character to replace invalid characters with (default: underscore)
member.returns: A sanitized file name safe for use in file systems

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Helpers.PathSecurityValidator.CombinePathSecurely(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Validates and combines multiple path segments safely. Throws if any segment attempts path traversal.
member.param: The base directory
Path segments to combine
member.returns: The validated combined path
member.exception: Thrown if path traversal is detected in any segment

member.name: T:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Interfaces.IMacSecurityService
member.summary: Service for generating and verifying Message Authentication Codes (MAC) using HMAC algorithms. Provides integrity and authenticity verification for API messages and data.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Interfaces.IMacSecurityService.GenerateMac(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a MAC (HMAC-SHA256) for the given data using the provided secret key.
member.param: The data to generate a MAC for
The secret key to use for HMAC generation
member.returns: Base64-encoded MAC signature

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Interfaces.IMacSecurityService.GenerateMacSha512(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a MAC (HMAC-SHA512) for the given data using the provided secret key.
member.param: The data to generate a MAC for
The secret key to use for HMAC generation
member.returns: Base64-encoded MAC signature

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Interfaces.IMacSecurityService.VerifyMac(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that a MAC signature matches the expected MAC for the given data and secret key. Uses timing-safe comparison to prevent timing attacks.
member.param: The original data
The MAC signature to verify (Base64-encoded)
The secret key used for MAC generation
member.returns: True if the MAC is valid, false otherwise

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Interfaces.IMacSecurityService.VerifyMacSha512(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that a MAC signature (SHA512) matches the expected MAC for the given data and secret key. Uses timing-safe comparison to prevent timing attacks.
member.param: The original data
The MAC signature to verify (Base64-encoded)
The secret key used for MAC generation
member.returns: True if the MAC is valid, false otherwise

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Interfaces.IMacSecurityService.GenerateMacForJson(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a MAC for JSON data (automatically serializes object to JSON before computing MAC).
member.param: The object to serialize and generate MAC for
The secret key to use for HMAC generation
member.returns: Base64-encoded MAC signature

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Interfaces.IMacSecurityService.VerifyMacForJson(System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies a MAC signature for JSON data.
member.param: The object to serialize and verify MAC for
The MAC signature to verify (Base64-encoded)
The secret key used for MAC generation
member.returns: True if the MAC is valid, false otherwise

member.name: T:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Interfaces.ISensitiveDataEncryptionService
member.summary: Defines asynchronous methods for encrypting and decrypting sensitive data.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Interfaces.ISensitiveDataEncryptionService.EncryptToBytesAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously encrypts the provided plaintext string using the specified key and returns the encrypted data as a byte array.
member.param: The encryption key (must be 16, 24, or 32 bytes long).
The plaintext string to encrypt.
member.returns: A Task containing a byte array with the IV followed by the encrypted data.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Interfaces.ISensitiveDataEncryptionService.DecryptFromBytesAsync(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Asynchronously decrypts the provided byte array using the specified key and returns the decrypted plaintext string.
member.param: The decryption key (must match the key used for encryption).
The byte array containing the IV followed by the encrypted data.
member.returns: A Task containing the decrypted plaintext string.

member.name: T:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Services.MacSecurityService
member.summary: Implementation of MAC (Message Authentication Code) security service using HMAC algorithms. Provides secure message integrity and authenticity verification for API communications.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Services.MacSecurityService.GenerateMac(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a MAC (HMAC-SHA256) for the given data using the provided secret key.
member.param: The data to generate a MAC for
The secret key to use for HMAC generation
member.returns: Base64-encoded MAC signature
member.exception: Thrown when data or secretKey is null or empty

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Services.MacSecurityService.GenerateMacSha512(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a MAC (HMAC-SHA512) for the given data using the provided secret key. Provides stronger security than SHA256 at the cost of a larger signature.
member.param: The data to generate a MAC for
The secret key to use for HMAC generation
member.returns: Base64-encoded MAC signature
member.exception: Thrown when data or secretKey is null or empty

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Services.MacSecurityService.VerifyMac(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that a MAC signature matches the expected MAC for the given data and secret key. Uses timing-safe comparison (CryptographicOperations.FixedTimeEquals) to prevent timing attacks.
member.param: The original data
The MAC signature to verify (Base64-encoded)
The secret key used for MAC generation
member.returns: True if the MAC is valid, false otherwise

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Services.MacSecurityService.VerifyMacSha512(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that a MAC signature (SHA512) matches the expected MAC for the given data and secret key. Uses timing-safe comparison (CryptographicOperations.FixedTimeEquals) to prevent timing attacks.
member.param: The original data
The MAC signature to verify (Base64-encoded)
The secret key used for MAC generation
member.returns: True if the MAC is valid, false otherwise

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Services.MacSecurityService.GenerateMacForJson(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a MAC for JSON data (automatically serializes object to JSON before computing MAC). Uses System.Text.Json for serialization with default options.
member.param: The object to serialize and generate MAC for
The secret key to use for HMAC generation
member.returns: Base64-encoded MAC signature
member.exception: Thrown when data or secretKey is null

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Services.MacSecurityService.VerifyMacForJson(System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies a MAC signature for JSON data. Uses System.Text.Json for serialization with default options.
member.param: The object to serialize and verify MAC for
The MAC signature to verify (Base64-encoded)
The secret key used for MAC generation
member.returns: True if the MAC is valid, false otherwise

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Services.SensitiveDataEncryptionService.EncryptToBytesAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts the provided data using AES encryption and returns the encrypted byte array.
member.param: The encryption key (must be 16, 24, or 32 bytes long).
The plaintext data to encrypt.
member.returns: A byte array containing the IV followed by the encrypted data.

member.name: M:Acontplus.Utilities.Security.Services.SensitiveDataEncryptionService.DecryptFromBytesAsync(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts the provided byte array using AES encryption and returns the plaintext string.
member.param: The decryption key (must match the key used for encryption).
The byte array containing the IV followed by the encrypted data.
member.returns: The decrypted plaintext string.

The maximum length of each line segment.
